name: Copycat's Phenomenon
description:
You're an elite member of the search-and-rescue squad sent by "Black Ravens" security organization. Your squad's task is to collect information and find any survivors.

Welcome to the "Envelope" research institute.

Copycat's Phenomenon is an experimental multiplayer pseudo-action horror game that was made in 2.5 months and is still in development so far.

Features

  • Creepy atmosphere. What was that shriek?
  • Multiplayer. You can play both with and against your friends.
  • Dark environments. Use any available light sources.
  • Player classes. Each have it's own items and advantages.
  • Bugs. Let me know if you find any. Please.
